definition: being in agreement or harmony : free from elements making for discord
examples: The decision was consonant with the company's usual practice.

definition: relating to or exhibiting consonance : resonant
one of a class of speech sounds (such as \p\, \g\, \n\, \l\, \s\, \r\) characterized by constriction or closure at one or more points in the breath channel, a letter representing a consonant
